Name: Attack
Text: Add your Level to the Points in this Block (Lv+PIB). Deal that much damage to a target.

Name: SplashAttack
Text: Deal (Lv+PIB) damage to a target. In the same Zone as that target, deal (.5*Lv+PIB) to one other target.

Name: Rampage
Text: Deal (Lv+PIB) damage to a target in your Zone. Deal (Lv) damage to a target in your Zone.

Name: AbuttingAttack
Text: Deal (Lv) damage to a target in your Zone.

Name: Powerhouse
Text: Distribute (2*Lv+PIB) as damage to multiple targets in your Zone.
